item.title: Jay Z responds to Beyoncé's 'Lemonade' in new song
item.ExtractedText:
Facebook Twitter Instagram
Jay Z responds to Beyoncé's 'Lemonade' in new song Updated 1401 GMT (2201 HKT) May 25, 2016 10 photos: The Internet can't break up these celebs Jay Z and Beyonce are either divorcing or having another baby every 18 months according to the internet. They were the subject of much Splitsville chatter in 2014 and that ramped up again in April 2016 with the release of her "Lemonade" album which contained songs referencing infidelity. Hide Caption 1 of 10 10 photos: The Internet can't break up these celebs It seems like every year, there are rumors that actor spouses Will Smith and Jada Pinkett Smith are about to call it quits. In August 2015 Will Smith even took to his Facebook page to deny it. Hide Caption 2 of 10 10 photos: The Internet can't break up these celebs Skeptics have been predicting the end of Hugh and Crystal Hefner's May-September union almost since they married in 2012. But the couple is still going strong. Hide Caption 3 of 10 10 photos: The Internet can't break up these celebs Kanye West is Kim Kardashian's third husband, and her track record is partially to blame for the almost constant rumors that their is trouble in their marriage. In May, she revealed that she was pregnant with their second child. Hide Caption 4 of 10 10 photos: The Internet can't break up these celebs Eddie Cibrian and LeAnn Rimes have had a bit of a messy relationship from the start. Cibrian was married to Brandi Glanville and Rimes to Dean Sheremet in 2008 when the couple met on the set of the Lifetime movie "Northern Lights." Soon, they had shed their respective spouses, and they married in 2011. Since then fans have been speculating that they won't last. Hide Caption 5 of 10 10 photos: The Internet can't break up these celebs Tabloids love to sound the death knell for the longtime marriage of Rita Wilson and Tom Hanks. The stories keep getting refuted, and the couple keeps on going. Hide Caption 6 of 10 10 photos: The Internet can't break up these celebs Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie have been dubbed "Brangelina" and have been reported to be breaking up for myriad reasons. The parents of six are still very much together. Hide Caption 7 of 10 10 photos: The Internet can't break up these celebs Keith Urban and Nicole Kidman often spend time apart, with him making music and her making movies. Naturally, that leads to tons of rumors that they are splitting. Hide Caption 8 of 10 10 photos: The Internet can't break up these celebs George Clooney took a while to get married again, and you would think folks would have been thrilled when he wed Amal Alamuddin in 2014. They have been the subject of gossip that things aren't going well. Hide Caption 9 of 10 10 photos: The Internet can't break up these celebs Relationships are Taylor Swift's bread and butter, as she is well known for writing songs about her failed ones. So whenever she dates just about anyone, the talk turns to them splitting. Hide Caption
